locations.dldescription: Location identifier usng a URN-based identification string containing namespace and unique identifier within the namespace.Used as an externally meaningful identifier.

identifier.dldescription: A code used by the source system to identify the farm, such as an internally meaningful identifier

reference.dldescription: A unique name (up to 200 characters) supplied when the location was created

geo.dldescription: The geo coordinates of the place.

pastureType.dldescription: White clover/Ryegrass, Lucerne, Browntop, Lucerne / grass mix, Unimproved/tussock grasslands, Grass only, Summer C4 (paspalum) pastures, Irrigated pastures, C4 (Kikuyu) pastures, Clover Chicory, Plantain / clover

fertilityType.dldescription: Dairy, Sheep and Beef - High, Sheep and Beef - Medium, Sheep and Beef - Low

pawType.dldescription: Profile Available Water - High, ModerateHigh,Average, ModeratePoor, Poor

paw.dldescription: Indicates the measure of Profile Available Water

isLearning.dldescription: This value is true when there is sufficient data for learning to be used, otherwise false.

isActive.dldescription: Initially true meaning active, you may set this to false with PUT if you no longer wish to use this location (takes effect from the end of the billing cycle).

isIrrigated.dldescription: This value is true when the user want to add irrigation in the location. By default, it is false.

isCalirrigatedFinished.dldescription: True meaning finishing calculation on fly after applying irrigation. False means the calculation is still in process.

dateCreated.dldescription: System maintained, this field shows the date and time the location was created (local to the server).

dateDeactivated.dldescription: System maintained, this field shows the date and time the location was deactivated (is-active set to false).

shortForecast.dldescription: URL to access short forecast for the location

yearForecast.dldescription: URL to access year forecast for the location

longTermForecast.dldescription: URL to access long term forecast for the location

threeMonthForecast.dldescription: URL to access three month forecast for the location

paddocks.dldescription: URL to access list of paddocks for the location

weather.dldescription: URL to access weather data for the location

irrigation.dldescription: URL to access irrigation details for the location
